Discover why you should book your next stay at Roomie!

The Trusts Arena

The Trusts Arena is located just 9km to the west of the hotel and is home to a world class sports arena and a venue for concerts, exhibitions and major events.

All Experiences

Make an Enquiry

Please fill out the online enquiry form below and one of our friendly staff will be in contact with you as soon as possible.

The Avondale Advantage

Based in the Central Auckland suburb of Avondale just 9km from the bustling and vibrant CBD, public transport is breeze from here. We’re just 200m from the Electric Train that will whisk you to Eden Park in 11 mins, Newmarket Shopping in 22 mins and the Central Business District, Spark Arena or Mt Smart Stadium in 33 minutes. Major bus routes also leave from just around the corner heading both into the city and further West.
